metadata.title:
Systematic evaluation of chromatin
 immunoprecipitation sequencing to study 
histone occupancy in dormancy transitions of 
grapevine buds

authors_verbatim: Hermawaty D.; Cahn J.; Lister R.; Considine M. J.

acknowledgement.exact_text:
Acknowledgments:
We express deep sadness at the passing of Tinashe Chabikwa and sincere condolences to his family. Tinashe was a very kind and brilliant scientist, and is sorely missed. He contributed greatly to this manuscript.
We are thankful to Keith Mugford of Moss Wood Wines for enduring support and access to plant material at often inconvenient times.
We are also very grateful to the team of the Centre for Microscopy, Characterization and Analysis of the University of Western Australia for technical guidance.

instruments.verbatim: Abcam ChIP kit plant (Abcam, cat. no. ab117137)
AMPure XP beads (Beckman Coulter Life Science, cat. no. A63881)
NEBNext Ultra II DNA Library Prep Kit for Illumina
